text: Haut-Lomami is one of the 26 provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The capital is Kamina. ==History== From 1966 to 2015, Haut-Lomami was administered as a district as part of the Katanga Province. ==Territories== * Bukama * Kabongo * Kamina * Kaniama * Malemba-Nkulu Territory ==References== Category:Provinces of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:2015 establishments in Africa
title: Haut-Lomami
